solution_line_template: In {years_from_now} years, my dog will be {dog_age_in_future} years old, so my dog is {dog_age_in_future} - {years_from_now} = <<{dog_age_in_future}-{years_from_now}={dog_current_age}>>{dog_current_age} years old now.
So I am {my_age_when_dog_born} + {dog_current_age} = <<{my_age_when_dog_born}+{dog_current_age}={my_current_age}>>{my_current_age} years old now.
